description:
Sleep warm without weighing down your pack. The VectAir UL 4S Insulated Sleeping Pad uses 200 grams of Hyperloft synthetic insulation to create a barrier between you the chilly ground below. Thanks to an R-value of 5.4 it’s plenty comfortable for 4-season use, and the included pump sack makes inflation a breeze.

  • Made of lightweight 30-denier brushed polyester ripstop with an internal TPU laminate and welded seams to keep the pad air-tight
  • Internal mylar film reflects heat back to you
  • Offset dot welds eliminate cold spots
  • 200g of HyperLoft synthetic insulation is lightweight and warm
  • Low-profile recessed valve creates a smooth sleeping surface
  • Roll-top pump sack inflates quickly and has enough extra room to store a compact pillow or sleeping clothes
  • Hook-and-loop strap keeps the pad rolled for storage
  • Pump sack and repair kit included
name: MEC VectAir UL 4S Insulated Sleeping Pad Long Wide - Unisex
